@description.name: @description
@description.body: Various utility methods helpful when working with XML documents

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return namespace declarations defined onto element, if any

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} the XML element to search for namespace declarations
@param.description: the XML element to search for namespace declarations

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map?} prefix-to-URI map, or null if no xmlns attributes found
@return.description: prefix-to-URI map, or null if no xmlns attributes found

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Resolve a QName using provided namespace resolver

The result format is "{" + Namespace URI + "}" + local part. If the namespace URI is empty, only the local part is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: namespaceResolver {Function} A prefix => namespaceUri function, returning null when prefix is unknown
@param.description: A prefix => namespaceUri function, returning null when prefix is unknown

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} the string representation of the resolved QName
@return.description: the string representation of the resolved QName

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} in case the QName prefix could not be resolved
@throws.description: in case the QName prefix could not be resolved

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the text value of an XML node, after trimming leading and trailing whitespace

@param.name: @param
@param.body: node {Node} XML node to get text from
@param.description: XML node to get text from

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String?} whitespace trimmed text or null if empty
@return.description: whitespace trimmed text or null if empty

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return the text value of an element's attribute, after trimming leading and trailing whitespace

You may supply the Error build-in object as the defaultValue parameter in order to request that an exception is thrown when value is missing.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} XML element holding required attribute

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributeName {String} name of required attribute, may be fully qualified
@param.description: name of required attribute, may be fully qualified

@param.name: @param
@param.body: defaultValue {String?} the text to return in case the attribute is empty/missing
@param.description: the text to return in case the attribute is empty/missing

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} whitespace trimmed attribute value or the default value if empty/missing
@return.description: whitespace trimmed attribute value or the default value if empty/missing

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Parse a string of specified value type against provided component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: component {qookery.IComponent} the component that will serve as the context for evaluations
@param.description: the component that will serve as the context for evaluations

@param.name: @param
@param.body: type {String} one of the known value types
@param.description: one of the known value types

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Parse XML element attributes according to component's attribute type mapping

Supported types are those of qookery.util.Xml#parseValue()

@param.name: @param
@param.body: component {qookery.IComponent} Qookery component to serve as the base of any conversion
@param.description: Qookery component to serve as the base of any conversion

@param.name: @param
@param.body: element {Element} XML element to read attributes from
@param.description: XML element to read attributes from

@param.name: @param
@param.body: typeMap {Map?} custom type mapping; if provided, it overrides the component's type mapping
@param.description: custom type mapping; if provided, it overrides the component's type mapping

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} attribute name to converted attribute value map
@return.description: attribute name to converted attribute value map
